function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Utilizing artificial intelligence and image processing technology for medical diagnosis","Impact":"Risk of relying solely on technology for critical medical processes","Mitigation":"Ensure human oversight in the medical diagnosis process","Technologies":"Artificial Intelligence, Image Processing","People":"Patients, Healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, Medical technology companies"},{"Description":"Having informal close relationships and provision of reaching them for overcoming potential future financial constraints","Impact":"Risk of relying on informal relationships for financial support","Mitigation":"Diversify financial support networks and seek formal financial assistance","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Businesses, Individuals","Owner":"Business owners, Individuals, Financial institutions"},{"Description":"Value co-creation is broadened to the service network to include other stakeholders such as their competitors","Impact":"Risk of sharing sensitive business information with competitors","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines and nondisclosure agreements for information sharing","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Business owners, Competitors, Governing bodies","Owner":"Business owners, Legal experts"}]}
